gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 105, Bulls 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pistons defeated the Bulls, 105-95. Cade Cunningham (26 points, five assists, five rebounds) and Jalen Duren (14 points, 10 rebounds, five assists, three blocks) led Detroit in the win. DeMar DeRozan (25 points), Nikola Vucevic (25 points, 10 rebounds), and Andre Drummond (20 points, 11 rebounds) led the Bulls in the loss.
